title: Oil Holds Drop as US and Iran Signal Progress in Nuclear Talks
description: Oil held a decline after positive talks between the US and Iran over the OPEC member’s nuclear program, paring crude’s risk premium.
content: Oil held a decline after positive talks between the US and Iran over the OPEC member’s nuclear program, paring crude’s risk premium.
